sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Rinse idli rice, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds. Soak in water for 6-8 hours. 2. Drain the water and blend urad dal and fenugreek seeds into a smooth batter. 3. Transfer the batter to a bowl. 4. Blend idli rice into a slightly coarse batter. 5. Mix both batters together, adding water as needed to make a thick batter. 6. Add salt to the batter and mix well. 7. Grease idli molds with olive oil. 8. Pour the batter into the molds. 9. Steam idlis in a steamer for 10-12, until cooked through. 10. Serve hot with sambar and coconut chutney.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Indian">8f495a179791021069a3b6fce053afcf</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort/> <image/> <ingredients/> <meal_type display_value="Breakfast">b08512df9751021069a3b6fce053afd4</meal_type> <name>Idli</name> <nutrition>Calories: 100, Protein: 5g, Fat: 2g, Carbs: 20g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Soak idli rice, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds. 2. Blend into batters.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:56:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4a5917d797d5021069a3b6fce053afd6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
